name: part_008
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Dec 19, 2021)【3DLIVE】メルキス3周年LIVE♡Xmas Party【#メルキス３周年ライブ】 [6J010KA__RQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Yozora Mel and Yuzuki Choco (Mel-Kiss) perform the song 'Kimi no Signal'.
scenes.song_name: Kimi no Signal (君色シグナル)

scenes.description: MC segment where Mel-Kiss announces their 3rd Anniversary commemorative goods.

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: オークルで眠ってたつぼみに
subtitles.english: To the buds that were sleeping in ochre

subtitles.original: 春の日差しを届けて
subtitles.english: Deliver the spring sunshine

subtitles.original: くれる
subtitles.english: To me

subtitles.original: 君をいつだっていつだって
subtitles.english: Always, always thinking

subtitles.original: 想ってるから
subtitles.english: About you

subtitles.original: きっとねいつかいつかちゃんと
subtitles.english: I hope that someday, someday

subtitles.original: わかってほしい
subtitles.english: You'll understand

subtitles.original: 二人で描いた未来を
subtitles.english: The future we painted together

subtitles.original: もっと近い距離で見つめられるように
subtitles.english: So we can look at it from even closer

subtitles.original: 夢見てるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm dreaming

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: メル様！これからもよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Lady Mel! Looking forward to working with you from now on too!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生、こちらこそ！
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei, same here!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: あの日触れた君のシグナル
subtitles.english: The signal from you I touched that day

subtitles.original: 始まりの扉が開くよ
subtitles.english: The door to the beginning is opening

subtitles.original: あのね
subtitles.english: You know...

subtitles.original: 君はいつだっていつだって変わらないでね
subtitles.english: Please always, always stay the same

subtitles.original: 私に何回も何回もシグナル
subtitles.english: Send me signals again and again

subtitles.original: 送ってほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to send them

subtitles.original: 輝くあの虹のように
subtitles.english: Like that shining rainbow

subtitles.original: 涙のあとも奇跡に変えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll turn even the traces of tears into miracles

subtitles.original: 君はいつだっていつだって変わらないから
subtitles.english: Because you're always, always the same

subtitles.original: 私が何回も何回もシグナル
subtitles.english: I'll send signals again and again

subtitles.original: 送ってあげる
subtitles.english: I'll send them to you

subtitles.original: 夢見たあの丘目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for that hill I dreamed of

subtitles.original: 挫けそうな時も頑張れそうだよ
subtitles.english: Even when I'm about to give up, I feel like I can do my best

subtitles.original: 君がいるから
subtitles.english: Because you are here

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ここまでいっぱい曲聴いてもらったけど、みんなどうだった？どうだったかなー？
subtitles.english: We've listened to a lot of songs so far, but how was it everyone? How was it~?

subtitles.original: おおー！めっちゃ言ってくれるじゃん！
subtitles.english: Oh! You guys are saying so much!

subtitles.original: えー、そんなに良かった？チョコ嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Eh, was it that good? Choco's so happy!

subtitles.original: メルもめっちゃ嬉しい！ありがとう！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Mel's really happy too! Thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: でね、でもうそろそろ終盤になってきたんだけど... えー、早い...
subtitles.english: And, well, we're getting close to the end... Eh, so soon...

subtitles.original: ここで、なんと重大発表です！
subtitles.english: And now, we have a major announcement!

subtitles.original: なんと、なんと！メルキス3周年記念グッズが発売されます！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not! Mel-Kiss 3rd Anniversary commemorative goods will be on sale!

subtitles.original: やったー！うー、すごい！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Hooray! Ooh, amazing! Yay!

subtitles.original: まず、一つ目は... うん。
subtitles.english: First, the first item is... Yep.

subtitles.original: コップ！私たちとお揃いのメルキスコップが、こちら！
subtitles.english: A cup! A Mel-Kiss cup matching ours, right here!

subtitles.original: こちら！かわいい！かわいい！
subtitles.english: Right here! It's so cute! So cute!

subtitles.original: 一緒にKPしよう！乾杯！乾杯！
subtitles.english: Let's KP together! Cheers! Cheers!

subtitles.original: そして、二つ目は、こちら！
subtitles.english: And then, the second item is this!

subtitles.original: じゃーん！メルキスの可愛いロゴが入ったTシャツ！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! A T-shirt with the cute Mel-Kiss logo on it!

subtitles.original: え、これ寝巻きとかに着れる？
subtitles.english: Eh, can I wear this as pajamas or something?

subtitles.original: うんうん！お出かけも一緒！黒と白があるよ！
subtitles.english: Yeah! Wear it out too! It comes in black and white!

subtitles.original: いや、もう二色ね、揃えちゃうもんねチョコ。
subtitles.english: No, Choco's definitely getting both colors.

subtitles.original: メルも揃えちゃうもんね。おそろっちしちゃう？
subtitles.english: Mel's getting both too. Shall we match?

subtitles.original: ペアるっく？双子コーデでペアるっく？ペアるっくも出来るよ！
subtitles.english: Matching looks? Matching in twin outfits? You can do matching looks too!

subtitles.original: 最高じゃん！最高！
subtitles.english: That's the best! The best!

subtitles.original: そして、三つ目！TAYA先生描き下ろし、メルキスアクリルジオラマスタンド！
subtitles.english: And the third one! A Mel-Kiss acrylic diorama stand, newly drawn by TAYA-sensei!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！え、めっちゃめちゃ可愛い！やばくない？
subtitles.english: Yay! Eh, it's so incredibly cute! Isn't it crazy?

subtitles.original: やばいよね！みんな見て！このサンタ衣装！
subtitles.english: It is crazy! Everyone look! These Santa outfits!

subtitles.original: 今回はオリジナルで考えていただいたんですよ！めっちゃ可愛いでしょう？可愛い！
subtitles.english: They were designed specially for this! It's so cute, right? Cute!

subtitles.original: メルたちをお家にお迎えしてね。してくれるよね？
subtitles.english: Please welcome Mel and Choco into your home. You will, won't you?

subtitles.original: さらに！今回は数量限定で、メルキス二人の直筆サイン入り全部セットが販売されるよ！
subtitles.english: Furthermore! This time, a full set including hand-signed cards from both of us will be available in limited quantities!
